data: Who is Claudiu Popa? Everything to know about Canada’s cybersecurity expert Back Story Passion for Canada’s Cybersecurity Standing on the World Stage With a robust Computer Science degree and top-tier industry certifications in information security, risk management, privacy, and more, he stands as a leading authority in Canada’s cybersecurity sector. As the head of the nation’s largest consortium of cybersecurity organizations and the founder of Canada’s only cybersafety foundation , he leverages his extensive credentials and expertise to drive innovation and enhance digital protection across the country. Additionally, as a respected expert witness in the cybersecurity field, he is qualified to provide legal opinions and testimony, further establishing his role as a pivotal figure in promoting online safety and resilience. His unique combination of technical knowledge and legal insight makes him an invaluable resource for organizations and legal teams navigating the complexities of cybersecurity challenges. knowledgeflow cybersafety foundation Empowering Others Through Cybersafety Education and Public Speaking Claudiu has a passion for helping and educating others, especially those in diverse audiences. His work at KnowledgeFlow focuses on children, students, seniors, and other vulnerable sectors. An avid collector of important books and unique artifacts, Claudiu enjoys writing his Bad Privacy and Bad Security blogs and occasionally recording CyberSecurED podcasts . While he strives to be an exciting and informative public speaker, he truly loves to infect his four curious children (in both senses of the word) with a certain zeal for learning and sharing. fitness ADVOCATE From Fitness to Fintech – A Tech Expert With Business Acumen As an engaging professional speaker, Claudiu draws upon a vast number of interests and skills. From fitness training and collecting books to his experience applying adult learning principles across four continents, he seamlessly integrates his role as an adjunct professor and lecturer at higher education institutions. His engaging presentations reflect the depth of his expertise, stemming from decades of teaching and research. With insights gained from both academia and real-world applications, Claudiu’s talks not only inspire but also empower audiences to navigate the digital landscape with a heightened understanding of privacy and cybersecurity. innovate and motivate Shaping the Next Generation of Critical Thinking Leaders As a passionate speaker and educator, Claudiu leads teams of professionals and aspiring leaders on virtual expeditions into the most exciting aspects of cyber, from the future of artificial intelligence to the most fascinating parts of the Deep Web. Whether speaking to industry leaders, law enforcement professionals, international delegations or educators, Claudiu’s talks are always immersive and captivating . Deeply interested in the ethics of data collection and the future of information science, Claudiu is a technologist whose thought leadership is always accessible in numerous formats from his multiple books, to his numerous articles. He parlays his interest in humanitarian and animal causes into vivid examples of human achievement and technological progress. looking to do some good? Claudiu Strongly Supports These Amazing Causes
